/about.summary: This site is an AI-powered content generator that dynamically creates tailored responses for any URL path, offering explanations, stories, or data in formats like HTML or JSON. Designed to make learning and browsing engaging, it uses no databases or servers, relying solely on AI to produce fresh, on-demand content with a touch of humor. The AI, trained on diverse knowledge, handles everything from factual topics to creative ideas, while humans handle its development. Key features include API access, editable pages, and links to related resources like help, privacy policies, and topic explorations.

/privacy.summary: This site does not collect, store, or share personal information, including names, emails, or IP addresses. Data provided via URL paths or POST requests is used only for real-time AI content generation and is not retained. No cookies, trackers, or third-party services are used, and all content generation occurs securely without persistent storage. The policy may be updated, with changes posted on the page, and users can contact the site via the provided link for questions.
